nodes.text: Wh-? A ghoul! Guards!
Hello there, stranger. Always a pleasure to see a new face. Name's Randal...I'm the Chief Amenities Officer. Need something?
This is the Amenities Office. Got your typical stock... basic living necessities, some books, "how to" manuals, some tools, stimpacks, medical supplies, this and that.
No problem. Plus, here... have a couple of frag grenades on me. Consider it my thanks for wiping out those raiders.
Okay, here you go. One Hy-Mag. Kinda looks like a lava lamp, doesn't it? Oh, don't drop it... it's pretty fragile.
Really? Can't say I recall you. You got any papers on you? Might clear up the matter.

You can take the Citizenship test. Proconsul Gregory gives it to any Outsider who wants to become a Citizen. You should probably talk to First Citizen Lynette first, though. She kind of runs the show around here.
Well, sorry to break it to you, but I'm only authorized to do transactions with Citizens. No offense to you, but it's the rule, you know? You might try Happy Harry's out in the Courtyard.
Sure. What's on your mind?
Yeah, he said you'd be stopping by...
So... you're Citizen , right? Wait one minute, and I'll go get you the Hydroelectric Magneto...uh, the Hy-Mag.
Yeah, I know. I'm still waiting for the requisition lists to clear the server, but it's going to be a while. Don't know what to say. Things just take time.
Wh-?! A mutant! Guards!
Well... uh, all right.
That'll do it for you, then?
Well, let me run it through the reader here, and we'll just make sure everything's on the up and up. Won't take but a moment.

Nothing less than a Heckler and Koch G11, one of the best assault weapons ever made...(hefts weapon, passes it to you)...fires a 4.7 mm caseless cartridge, 50-round magazine. When it talks, people listen.
A GECK? That's a Garden of Eden Creation Kit, a kind of gray suitcase looking thing, right? I haven't heard anyone mention one of those in... well, since... almost forever.
Yeah, the First Citizen said you'd be stopping by. Well, let me tell you, friend, you got a BEAUTY waiting for you.
Hate to break it to you, friend, but we don't have ours anymore. Used it up to make Vault City...*poof.* All gone.
An intruder! Guards! Guards!
She's in the Council Building... head out the building here, make a right, and keep heading down the street past the park. You should run right smack into it.
Well, hmmm. Here's your problem, as I see it: the GECK's an old piece of tech... pre-war tech, in fact. You just can't "find" them anymore. They were only issued to Vaults.
Thanks.
Congratulations, !
Well, if you had access to our Vault Central Computer, you might be able to find some mention of some other Vaults. But only Citizens are allowed in the Vault.
Thanks.
Everything checks out. Here's your papers back. What can I do for you?

links.text: Gechkk
Well, it depends. What is this place?
Nooooooooo-pe
Mind if I ask you some other questions?
Councillor McClure said you'd have a... uh, hydro-magneto-thingie that I could have for the Gecko power plant.
Valerie over at the maintenance shed could use a new wrench and some pliers.
The First Citizen sent me here to claim my reward.
I may be back some other time.
Sounds great. Can I see what you have in stock?
Councillor McClure said you'd have a... uh, hydro-magneto-thingie that I could have for the Gecko power plant.
Do you have a GECK?
Thanks. I'll put them to good use.
Can I ask you some other questions?
Great. Can I see what else you have in stock?
Say, what else do you have in stock?
Thanks. I might stare at this for a few hours before taking it to the Gecko plant.
Mind if I ask you some questions?
Never mind. I'll talk to you later.
No, I don't have them on me right now.
Yes. Here you go.
Thanks for the information. I'll go look for her.
I see. Mind if I ask you another question?
All right. Where is she?
The First Citizen sent me here to claim my reward.
But... uh, I am a Citizen. Don't you remember me?
Councillor McClure said you'd have a... uh, hydro-magneto-thingie that I could have for the Gecko power plant.
How can I become a Citizen?
Fine. Goodbye.
Mind if I ask you some other questions?
Councillor McClure said you'd have a... uh, hydro-magneto-thingie that I could have for the Gecko power plant.
Valerie over at the maintenance shed could use a new wrench and some pliers.
Shamble off
Gechkk?
What is this place again?
All right.
Actually, never mind, I'll come back later for it.
Actually, never mind, I'll come back later for it.
All right.
Maybe I can go find those tools somewhere else, then.
I see. Mind if I ask you some other questions?
I'll see you later.
Mind if I ask you some questions?
Yeah, that'll be it for today.
Mind if I ask you some other questions?
All right. I'm sure everything's in order.
Wh-?! Whoa! Give those papers back!
I'll bet. Thanks.
Shamble off
Mind if I ask you something else?
NEED Gechkkk
Actually, keep it for me. I'll pick it up later.
What is it?
NEED Gechkkk.
Mind if I ask you something else?
Shamble off
I see. Mind if I ask you another question?
Thanks for the information. I'll go look for her.
Shamble off
NEED Valt.
Mind if I ask you something else?
[continue]
Tanks
[continue]
Actually, do you mind if I ask you some questions instead?
Let me see what you have in stock.
Nothing today, actually.
